import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { Button, Message, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { USER_LOGIN_MUTATION } from '../query' const Login = () => { const [ loginUser, { success } ] = useMutation(USER_LOGIN_MUTATION) const usernameRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() return (
) } export default Login
